title: Ni Zai Xing Guang Shen Chu
synopsis:
Bai Xi and his friend Liu Chunchun experienced a bizarre car accident. Following this misfortune, Bai's new assistant Han Zhuo turns out to be a bodyguard with superpowers. Meanwhile, a famous art gallery invites Bai to hold his art exhibition under an incredibly profitable deal. Afterward, another mysterious figure by the name of Wang Yuanchen makes his appearance. As the exhibition date approaches, the truth behind the scenes begins to unfold. 

(Source: Guodong Subs)
